mods: You learn the Guidance cantrip. When you cast it, it adds a d6 expertise die.

You learn the Guiding Bolt spell and always have it prepared. You can also cast it a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus without expending any resources, and when you do so it is upcast 1 lvl. You recover these uses whenever you finish a long rest.

As a bonus action, you can shapeshift into a celestial form for 10 minutes, or until you dismiss it early or are incapacitated. You can do this a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus between long rests. While in your celestial form, you shed bright light in a 20' radius and dim light for an additional 20'.
variables: While in your celestial form, a constellation of an archer appears above you. When you enter this form and as a bonus action on subsequent turns while it lasts, you can make a ranged spell attack using the archer's bow against a creature within 60' of you. On a hit, it deals radiant dmg equal to 2d8 + your ability score modifier.

While in your celestial form, a constellation of a chalice appears above you. Whenever you cast a levelled spell that restores hit points to a creature while in this form, you or another creature within 30' of you can regain hit points equal to 2d8 + your ability score modifier.

While in your celestial form, a constellation of a dragon appears above you. While in this form, whenever you make an INT or WIS check, or a CON save to maintain concentration on a spell, you can treat a roll of 12 or lower on the d20 as a 13.

mods: You gain a d6 expertise die in History.

As an action, you can conjure an ancient beast as a minion in an unoccupied space within 30' of you. You can do this a number of times equal to half your proficiency bonus between long rests. You can only have one summoned at a time.
The companion's stat block can be found here: https://homebrewery.naturalcrit.com/share/M3IJv2wp-9di
